Cover pillow with pillowcase.sentence: The patient selects a clean pillowcase from the linen closet.
Cover pillow with pillowcase.subject: The patient

Cover pillow with pillowcase.sentence: The patient holds the pillow in one hand and the pillowcase in the other hand.
Cover pillow with pillowcase.subject: The patient

Cover pillow with pillowcase.sentence: The patient opens the pillowcase by holding the opening with both hands.
Cover pillow with pillowcase.subject: The patient

Cover pillow with pillowcase.sentence: The patient inserts the pillow into the opened pillowcase.
Cover pillow with pillowcase.subject: The patient

Cover pillow with pillowcase.sentence: The patient shakes the pillowcase to ensure the pillow is fully enclosed.
Cover pillow with pillowcase.subject: The patient
